PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-12572009-07-30JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectOUELLETTE, The Hon. Jean-Paul, RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. JEAN-PAUL OUELLETTE, who was required to relocate to the City of Miramichi in the Province of New Brunswick, following his appointment as a Judge of the Court of Queen’s Bench of New Brunswick, Family Division, on April 11, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: OUELLETTE, The Hon. Jean-Paul, RELOCATION EXPENSES
precis: Order prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. JEAN-PAUL OUELLETTE, who was required to relocate to the City of Miramichi in the Province of New Brunswick, following his appointment as a Judge of the Court of Queen’s Bench of New Brunswick, Family Division, on April 11, 2008.
